title: 20 x Premium Food Storage Bags | 2.4 Gallons Size Freezer Bags by XupZip™ | Leakproof Reusable Food Bags | Airtight Snack Bags | Heavy Duty Plastic Food Bags | BPA Free Reusable Large Freezer Bags
features: ✅ SEAL IN ALL THE FRESHNESS: The airtight bamboo, seal and save, sealable plastic bags will keep your favourite snacks, herbs, nuts, sandwiches, biscuits, meat, fish, or salads fresh for longer.
✅ NO MORE MESSY ACCIDENTS: Boasting a leakproof double seal, our soup bags will protect your fridge, freezer, backpack, or kid's lunch bag from leaky accidents.
✅ STAND AND FILL EXPANDABLE BOTTOM: You will be very happy to see that our zip lock bags feature an expandable, stand and fill bottom for maximum convenience.
✅ ULTRA-VERSATILE FREEZER BAGS: If you are looking for excellent quality, multipurpose food bags that can double as reusable sandwich bags or soup containers, look no further.
✅ GREAT QUALITY REUSABLE FREEZER BAGS: Save money with our reusable food bags, which will allow you to use them for longer and stop relying on disposable food storage solutions
✅ VERY STRONG PLASTIC RESEALABLE BAGS: Made from heavy duty plastic, our ziplock bags will stand the test of time and help you store, freeze, and carry your foods for longer.
✅ BPA-FREE FOOD-SAFE SANDWICH BAGS: Our zip lock freezer bags are 100% BPA-free, which makes them ideal for your kid's lunch, your snacks, or even your dog's treats.
✅ MICROWAVE AND FREEZER SAFE: Storing, freezing, or reheating baby food and leftovers just got easier with our value for money microwave-safe freezer bag set.
✅ PERFECT SIZE ON THE GO SNACK BAGS: Whether you need a small lunch bag, a reusable sandwich bag, or a salad bag, our reusable ziplock bags will cover your needs.
✅ EASY TO USE FREEZER STORAGE CONTAINERS: Our goal is to make sure you are very pleased with your zip bags. That's why our large freezer bags combine functionality with style.
description: Product Description Half Gallon Zip Slider Gallon Zip Slider 2 Gallon Zip Slider Half Gallon Bamboo Seal Gallon Bamboo Seal 2.5 Gallon Bamboo Seal Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.6 out of 5 stars 1,088 4.6 out of 5 stars 1,033 4.6 out of 5 stars 517 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,316 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,316 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,316 Price £10.99 £ 10 . 99 £11.99 £ 11 . 99 £11.99 £ 11 . 99 £9.99 £ 9 . 99 £9.99 £ 9 . 99 £11.99 £ 11 . 99 SEAL SMART ZIP SMART ZIP SMART ZIP BAMBOO BAMBOO BAMBOO SIZE HALF UK GALLON (2.27L) UK GALLON (4.55L) 2 UK GALLON (9.1L) HALF UK GALLON (2.27) UK GALLON (4.55L) 2.5 UK GALLON (9.1L) BPA FREE ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ HEAVY DUTY ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ STAND & FILL ✓ ✓ ✓ - no data - no data - no data BAG DIMENSION 22.8 X 22cm 30.6 x 28.8 36.5 x 32.5cm 22.8 x 22cm 30.6 x 28.8cm 36.5 x 40.6cm The Mom-Approved Reusable Snack Bags Are Here To Make Life In The Kitchen 99% Easier! Finding a convenient freezer bag for your delicious leftovers or a food storage bag for your fresh veggies can be quite a challenge - especially if you don't want to settle for low-quality reusable food storage bags anymore. Discover The XupZip Solution! Here, at XupZip, we decided to put an end to your search with our newest reusable storage bags, which are specifically designed to help keep your foods fresh, your freezer neatly organised, and your lunch bag mess-free. Thicker, Stronger, More Versatile Freezer Storage Bags Now you can finally invest in a set of zipper bags that will stand the test of time. Made from heavy-duty, thick, and strong plastic, our sealable bags can withstand the daily wear and tear of a busy family kitchen without skipping a beat. Ideal for storing solid or liquid foods, every single zip bag can solve a different problem in your kitchen and take your kitchen organisation skills to another level. One Set Of Food Freezer Bags, 100+1 Uses Following the success of our 2-in-1 sealed bags, these new freezer bags for food will add more versatility to your kitchen and help you store, freeze, re-heat, and carry anything - from your favourite soup to freshly-cut fruit like never before. Keep your kid's school lunch fresh for hours using one of our sandwich bags. Store your freshly-bought meat, poultry, or fish in one of our freezer storage bags. Organise your refrigerator, your kitchen cabinets, your pantry, or your freezer with our resealable food bags. And the best part? Every set includes multiple large reusable freezer bags that can be used to store your kid's arts and crafts accessories, small toys, makeup, pet treats, toiletries, or office supplies. You name it! Stand & Fill Expandable Bottom One of the most annoying things about reusable food bags is having to fill them with one hand while struggling to keep them open with the other. Our smart stand and fill, expandable bottom is here to solve this problem once and for all. Leakproof, Airtight, Double-Protection Bamboo Seal Tired of cleaning up messy accidents due to leaky freezer bags? Now you can store solids and liquids without any worries thanks to the leak-resistant, air-tight bamboo zip lock seal. Find The Size That Covers Your Needs Available in 3 different sizes, our sealable food bags are here to help you store anything from herbs and nuts to large pieces of meat in style. Pick the size you need: Half-Gallon Size (27.5 x 18.24cm) Gallon-Size (32.8 x 26.89cm) 2-Gallon Size (41 x 30.91cm)
